attributes.action: to force Birmingham City council to raise the height limit for buildings built in the city from the height now to 350m.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The height limit at the moment is so small because of Birmingham international, however Canary Wharf in London has the highest building in the country and Heathrow airport is only 2 miles away. I need to say no more.

rejection.details: Heathrow is considerably further from Canary Wharf than two miles.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
